member.name: T:IdentityModel.OidcClient.OidcClientOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for OidcClient

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.OidcClientOptions.Authority
member.summary: Gets or sets the authority.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.OidcClientOptions.ProviderInformation
member.summary: Gets or sets the provider information.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.OidcClientOptions.ClientId
member.summary: Gets or sets the client identifier (required).

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.OidcClientOptions.ClientSecret
member.summary: Gets or sets the client secret (if needed).

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.OidcClientOptions.Scope
member.summary: Gets or sets the scopes (required).

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.OidcClientOptions.RedirectUri
member.summary: Gets or sets the redirect URI (required).

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.OidcClientOptions.PostLogoutRedirectUri
member.summary: Gets or sets the post logout redirect URI.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.OidcClientOptions.Browser
member.summary: Gets or sets the browser implementation.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.OidcClientOptions.BrowserTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout for browser invisible mode.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.OidcClientOptions.ClockSkew
member.summary: Gets or sets the clock skew for validating identity tokens.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.OidcClientOptions.RefreshDiscoveryDocumentForLogin
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the discovery document is re-loaded for every login/prepare login request
member.value: true if discovery document needs to be re-loaded; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.OidcClientOptions.RefreshDiscoveryOnSignatureFailure
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the discovery document gets re-loaded when token validation fails due to signing key problems
member.value: true if discovery get re-loaded; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.OidcClientOptions.ResponseMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a response_mode of form_post will be used.
member.value: true for using form_post; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.OidcClientOptions.LoadProfile
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether claims are loaded from the userinfo endpoint
member.value: true for loading claims from userinfo; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.OidcClientOptions.FilterClaims
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to filter claims.
member.value: true if claims are filtered; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.OidcClientOptions.Flow
member.summary: Gets or sets the flow used for authentication (defaults to hybrid).

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.OidcClientOptions.RefreshTokenInnerHttpHandler
member.summary: Gets or sets the inner HTTP handler used with RefreshTokenHandler.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.OidcClientOptions.BackchannelHandler
member.summary: Gets or sets the HTTP handler used for back-channel communication (token and userinfo endpoint).

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.OidcClientOptions.BackchannelTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the backchannel timeout.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.OidcClientOptions.TokenClientAuthenticationStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the authentication style used by the token client (defaults to posting clientid/secret values).

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.OidcClientOptions.Policy
member.summary: Gets or sets the policy.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.OidcClientOptions.LoggerFactory
member.summary: Gets the logger factory.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.OidcClientOptions.FilteredClaims
member.summary: Gets or sets the claims types that should be filtered.

member.summary: The authentication flows

member.summary: authorization code

member.summary: hybrid

member.summary: The response mode

member.summary: form post

member.name: F:IdentityModel.OidcClient.OidcClientOptions.AuthorizeResponseMode.Redirect
member.summary: redirect

member.name: T:IdentityModel.OidcClient.Policy
member.summary: The validation policy for OidcClient

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.Policy.Discovery
member.summary: Gets or sets the policy for discovery.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.Policy.RequireAuthorizationCodeHash
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a c_hash is required (defaults to true).
member.value: true if c_hash is required; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.Policy.RequireAccessTokenHash
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether at_hash is required (defaults to true).
member.value: true if at_hash is required; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.Policy.RequireIdentityTokenOnRefreshTokenResponse
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an identity token is required on refresh token responses (defaults to false).
member.value: true if [require identity token on refresh token response]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.Policy.RequireIdentityTokenSignature
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an identity token must be signed or not (unsigned identity tokens are only allowed in authorization code flow)
member.value: true if identity token must be signed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:IdentityModel.OidcClient.Policy.ValidSignatureAlgorithms
member.summary: Gets or sets the supported identity token signing algorithms.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether [supports user information].

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether [supports end session].
